waman kafara fala yahzunka kuf'ruhu ilayna marjiʿuhum fanunabbi-uhum bima ʿamilu inna l-laha ʿalimun bidhati l-suduri
numattiʿuhum qalilan thumma nadtarruhum ila ʿadhabin ghalizin
wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa l-samawati wal-arda layaqulunna l-lahu quli l-hamdu lillahi bal aktharuhum la yaʿlamuna
lillahi ma fi l-samawati wal-ardi inna l-laha huwa l-ghaniyu l-hamidu
walaw annama fi l-ardi min shajaratin aqlamun wal-bahru yamudduhu min baʿdihi sabʿatu abhurin ma nafidat kalimatu l-lahi inna l-laha ʿazizun hakimun
ma khalqukum wala baʿthukum illa kanafsin wahidatin inna l-laha samiʿun basirun
alam tara anna l-laha yuliju al-layla fi l-nahari wayuliju l-nahara fi al-layli wasakhara l-shamsa wal-qamara kullun yajri ila ajalin musamman wa-anna l-laha bima taʿmaluna khabirun
